{"id":599307875,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1639044787,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/599307875/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"39.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        long sum =0;\n        for (int i : nums){\n            sum+=i;\n        }\n        long lefsum =0;\n        for (int i =0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            if (lefsum == sum-lefsum-nums[i]){\n                return i;\n            }\n            lefsum+= nums[i];\n            \n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
